definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (prob. *[[קַיְשְׁ]] Ar. qaysun Aram. [[קישׁא]] Nö:ZMG xi (1896), 167 orig.n.pr.dei as Ar. qys wh. now only in n.pr.pers. We:Heid. 2. 67);—K(e)iv:

father of Saul 1Sa 9:1, 1Sa 9:3, 1Sa 9:3, 1Sa 10:11, 1Sa 10:21, 1Sa 14:51, 2Sa 21:14, 1Ch 8:30, 1Ch 8:33 (where read [[אַבְנֵר]] Be Kau Kit), v:1Ch 8:33 = 1Ch 9:36, 1Ch 9:39 (read as above), v:1Ch 9:39, 1Ch 12:1, 1Ch 26:28.
